welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kirchzarten, a charming town nestled in the Black Forest region of Germany. Known for its stunning natural beauty and quaint villages, we invite you to explore and experience all that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colmar-houssen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Colmar-houssen Airport, used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
